j:jelly.p: Welcome to SNDs Interactive Process Flow. Here you can configure clickable process flows simply and quickly
Setting up interactive process flows is easy, just follow these simple steps:

ol.li: Select a name for your process flow
Select the table that this process flow should run on.
Pick a style for your process flow
Select a dispaly condition using the condition builder. This determines when this process flow should be displayed, allowing you to configure many process flows for one table.

j:jelly.p: Hit submit and then configure the process flow elements. Once these are configured you're ready to go. Configure the form for the selected table and add the "SND - Interactive Process Flow" formatter.
